actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land located in the State of Maryland to the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, to the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission all right, title, and interest in specified lands.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land located in the State of Maryland to the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission.
